Item ID41

Steel arrowtips are made with a steel bar requiring 35 Smithing, yielding 37.5 Smithing experience and 15 steel arrowtips. They are made into steel arrows when used with headless arrows, requiring 30 Fletching, yielding 75 experience per 15 arrows.

At 47 Thieving, they can be stolen from chests in Hemenster, Rellekka, and West Ardougne.

There is an item spawn in the northern section of the Edgeville Dungeon at level 10 Wilderness by the earth warriors.

They are purchased for 6 coins at the ranging shops: Hickton's Archery Emporium in Catherby, Dargaud's Bow and Arrows in the Ranging Guild, Gulluck and Sons on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] of the Grand Tree, and Void Knight Archery Store at the Void Knights' Outpost. They are purchased for 7 coins at Ava's Odds and Ends in Draynor Manor, and they are also purchased for 9 coins at the Armoury in the Combat Training Camp.

[[File:Steel arrowtips detail.png|left|130x200px]]
'''Steel arrowtips''' are made with a [[steel bar]] requiring 35 [[Smithing]], yielding 37.5 Smithing [[experience]] and 15 steel arrowtips. They are made into [[steel arrow]]s when used with [[headless arrow]]s, requiring 30 [[Fletching]], yielding 75 experience per 15 arrows. 

At 47 [[Thieving]], they can be stolen from [[Chest (steel arrowtips)|chest]]s in [[Hemenster]], [[Rellekka]], and [[West Ardougne]].

There is an [[item spawn]] in the northern section of the [[Edgeville Dungeon]] at level 10 [[Wilderness]] by the [[earth warrior]]s.

They are purchased for {{NoCoins|6}} coins at the ranging shops: [[Hickton's Archery Emporium]] in [[Catherby]], [[Dargaud's Bow and Arrows]] in the [[Ranging Guild]], [[Gulluck and Sons]] on the {{FloorNumber|uk=2}} of the [[Grand Tree]], and [[Void Knight Archery Store]] at the [[Void Knights' Outpost]]. They are purchased for {{NoCoins|7}} coins at [[Ava's Odds and Ends]] in [[Draynor Manor]], and they are also purchased for {{NoCoins|9}} coins at the [[Armoury]] in the [[Combat Training Camp]].
